paragraphs.title: # RUN/PASS/FAIL  FOR RUN-ID IN LAST N Days
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc select * from (
select 
results.run_info_id as RUN_ID,sum(result_splits_1.ran) AS RAN,
sum(result_splits_1.pass)as PASSED ,sum(result_splits_1.fail) as FAILED,
sum(result_splits_1.aborted) as ABORTED
FROM results
LEFT OUTER JOIN component AS component_1 ON component_1.id = results.component_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN releases AS releases_1 ON releases_1.id = results.release_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN result_splits AS result_splits_1 ON results.id = result_splits_1.result_id 
WHERE results.disabled IN (1) 
AND results.run_info_id IN (select id from run_info where FROM_UNIXTIME(start_time) >= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL - ${FOR DAYS=30} DAY))
AND results.release_id IN (1122,1139,1149,1161,1162)
AND results.type IN ('system')
AND result_splits_1.ran>0
GROUP BY results.run_info_id
ORDER BY results.last_update_time DESC
) as res
where RAN>50

paragraphs.title: % RUN/PASS/FAIL  FOR RUN-ID IN LAST N Days
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc
select * from (
select 
results.run_info_id as RUN_ID,sum(result_splits_1.ran) AS RAN,
sum(result_splits_1.pass)as PASSED ,sum(result_splits_1.fail) as FAILED,
sum(result_splits_1.aborted) as ABORTED,
sum(result_splits_1.pass)/sum(result_splits_1.ran)*100 as 'PASS%',
sum(result_splits_1.fail)/sum(result_splits_1.ran)*100 as 'FAIL%',
sum(result_splits_1.aborted)/sum(result_splits_1.ran)*100 as 'ABORTED%'
FROM results
LEFT OUTER JOIN component AS component_1 ON component_1.id = results.component_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN releases AS releases_1 ON releases_1.id = results.release_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN result_splits AS result_splits_1 ON results.id = result_splits_1.result_id 
WHERE results.disabled IN (1) 
AND results.run_info_id IN (select id from run_info where FROM_UNIXTIME(start_time) >= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL - ${FOR DAYS=30} DAY))
AND results.release_id IN (1122,1139,1149,1161,1162)
AND results.type IN ('system')
AND result_splits_1.ran>0
GROUP BY results.run_info_id
ORDER BY results.last_update_time DESC
) as res 
where RAN>50

paragraphs.title: # PASS/FAIL FOR OS AND  RUN ID
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc
select RUN_ID,OS,RAN,PASSED,FAILED,ABORTED from (
select 
results.run_info_id as RUN_ID ,results.os as OS,sum(result_splits_1.ran) AS RAN,
sum(result_splits_1.pass)as PASSED ,sum(result_splits_1.fail) as FAILED,
sum(result_splits_1.aborted) as ABORTED
FROM results
LEFT OUTER JOIN component AS component_1 ON component_1.id = results.component_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN releases AS releases_1 ON releases_1.id = results.release_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN result_splits AS result_splits_1 ON results.id = result_splits_1.result_id 
WHERE results.disabled IN (1) 
AND results.run_info_id IN (select id from run_info where FROM_UNIXTIME(start_time) >= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL - ${FOR DAYS=30} DAY))
AND results.release_id IN (1122,1139,1149,1161,1162)
AND results.type IN ('system')
AND result_splits_1.ran>0
AND results.os like '${OS GROUP=centos-6,centos-6|centos-7|debian-|ubuntu-|suse-}%'
GROUP BY results.run_info_id
ORDER BY results.last_update_time DESC ) as res
where RAN > 50

%jdbc
select * from (
select 
results.run_info_id as RUN_ID,results.os,sum(result_splits_1.ran) AS RAN,
sum(result_splits_1.pass)as PASSED ,sum(result_splits_1.fail) as FAILED,
sum(result_splits_1.aborted) as ABORTED,
sum(result_splits_1.pass)/sum(result_splits_1.ran)*100 as 'PASS%',
sum(result_splits_1.fail)/sum(result_splits_1.ran)*100 as 'FAIL%',
sum(result_splits_1.aborted)/sum(result_splits_1.ran)*100 as 'ABORTED%'
FROM results
LEFT OUTER JOIN component AS component_1 ON component_1.id = results.component_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN releases AS releases_1 ON releases_1.id = results.release_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN result_splits AS result_splits_1 ON results.id = result_splits_1.result_id 
WHERE results.disabled IN (1) 
AND results.run_info_id IN (select id from run_info where FROM_UNIXTIME(start_time) >= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL - ${FOR DAYS=30} DAY))
AND results.release_id IN (1122,1139,1149,1161,1162)
AND results.type IN ('system')
AND result_splits_1.ran>0
AND results.os like '${OS GROUP=centos-6,centos-6|centos-7|debian-|ubuntu-|suse-}%'
GROUP BY results.run_info_id
ORDER BY results.last_update_time DESC) as res
where RAN > 50

paragraphs.title: # RUN/PASS/FAIL FOR A RUN ID
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc 
select results.id as r_id,
results.os as r_os,result_splits_1.split_number,result_splits_1.ran,result_splits_1.pass,result_splits_1.fail,result_splits_1.aborted,component_1.name
FROM results
LEFT OUTER JOIN component AS component_1 ON component_1.id = results.component_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN releases AS releases_1 ON releases_1.id = results.release_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN result_splits AS result_splits_1 ON results.id = result_splits_1.result_id 
WHERE results.disabled IN (1) AND results.run_info_id IN (${RUN-ID}) AND results.type IN ('system')
ORDER BY results.last_update_time DESC;

paragraphs.title: % PASS/FAIL FOR A RUN ID
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc 
select id,component,os,sum(ran),sum(pass)/sum(ran)*100 as "pass%" ,
sum(fail)/sum(ran)*100 as "fail%" ,
sum(aborted)/sum(ran)*100 as "aborted%" from (
select results.id as id,results.os as os,
result_splits.split_number as split_num,result_splits.ran as ran,
result_splits.pass as pass,result_splits.fail as fail,result_splits.aborted as aborted,
component_1.name as component
FROM results
LEFT OUTER JOIN component AS component_1 ON component_1.id = results.component_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN releases AS releases_1 ON releases_1.id = results.release_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN result_splits AS result_splits ON results.id = result_splits.result_id 
WHERE results.disabled IN (1) AND results.run_info_id IN (${RUN-ID}) AND results.type IN ('system')
ORDER BY results.last_update_time DESC ) as m
group by component
having (sum(pass)/sum(ran)*100 <= ${PASS%LessThanEqualTo=100})

paragraphs.title: # of Blocked tests for a run-id
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc 
select substring(jira_url,37)as JIRA ,sum(number_of_testcases) as BLOCKED_TC_COUNT from analysis where jira_url<>''and  result_id in (select id from results where run_info_id = '${RUNID}') group by jira_url;

%pyspark 
import urllib
import urllib2
import json
from math import floor

def floored_percentage(val, digits):
    val *= 10 ** (digits + 2)
    #return '{1:.{0}f}%'.format(digits, floor(val) / 10 ** digits)
    return '{1:.{0}f}'.format(digits, floor(val) / 10 ** digits)
    
dashboard_host = "dashboard.qe.hortonworks.com"
dashboard_port = "5000"
base_url = "http://"+dashboard_host+":"+dashboard_port
run_id = z.input("Enter Run Id","")
component_pass_fail={}

if (run_id != ""):
    query="compact=true&component_id=&disabled=1&order_by=last_update_time+desc&run_info_id=%s&type=system" % (run_id)
    results_query="%s/hwqe-dashboard-api/v1/results?%s" % (base_url,query)
    req = urllib2.Request(results_query)
    req.add_header('Content-Type', 'application/json')
    resp = urllib2.urlopen(req)
    content = resp.read()
    results = json.loads(content)["results"]
    table_text_arr=[]
    table_header="ID\tCOMPONENT\tTOTAL_TESTS\tRESULT_STATUS\tJIRA\tJIRA_URL\tTYPE\t#BLOCKING\t%BLOCKING"
    table_text_arr.append(table_header)
    jira_list = []
    jira_dict = {}
    jira_dict["ALL"] ="ALL"

    for result in results:
        analysis = result["analyses"]
        for jira_url in analysis:
            analysis_jira=""
            analysis_jira_url=""
            analysis_jira_url=jira_url["jira_url"]
            if (analysis_jira_url == None):
                analysis_jira = analysis_jira_url
            elif (analysis_jira_url.startswith('http')):
                analysis_jira=analysis_jira_url[36:]
            else:
                analysis_jira = analysis_jira_url
            jira_dict[analysis_jira_url]=analysis_jira
        jira_list = list(jira_dict.items())
    selected_jira = z.select("JIRA",jira_list,"ALL")

    for result in results:
        table_text=""
        result_id=result["id"]
        component=result["component"]
        total_test_ran=result["r/p/f/a/rp/rf/ra"].split("/")[0]
        result_status=result["result_status"]
        table_text="%s\t%s\t%s\t%s" % (result_id,component,total_test_ran,result_status)
        analysis = result["analyses"]
        for analys in analysis:
            final_table_text=""
            analysis_jira=""
            analysis_jira_url=""
            analysis_jira_url=analys["jira_url"]
            if (analysis_jira_url == None):
                analysis_jira = analysis_jira_url
            elif (analysis_jira_url.startswith('http')):
                analysis_jira=analysis_jira_url[36:]
            else:
                analysis_jira = analysis_jira_url
            analysis_cnt=analys["number_of_testcases"]
            if (int(total_test_ran) > 0 and int(analysis_cnt) > 0):
                analysis_cnt_p=float(analysis_cnt)/float(total_test_ran)
                analysis_cnt_per=floored_percentage(analysis_cnt_p,2)
                analysis_type=analys["type"]
                final_row_text="%s\t%s\t%s\t%s\t%s\t%s" % (table_text,analysis_jira,analysis_jira_url,analysis_type,analysis_cnt,analysis_cnt_per)
                if(analysis_jira_url==selected_jira and selected_jira!="ALL"):
                    table_text_arr.append(final_row_text)
                elif (selected_jira=="ALL"):
                    table_text_arr.append(final_row_text)
                #table_text_arr.append(final_row_text)
    final_table_text = "\n".join(table_text_arr)
    table_heading='%table'
    print """%s %s"""% (table_heading,final_table_text)

paragraphs.title: # Defect across components
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc 
SELECT  component.name,analysis.jira_url , analysis.number_of_testcases as TC_BLOCKED FROM results LEFT OUTER JOIN analysis ON results.id = analysis.result_id LEFT OUTER JOIN component ON component.id =results.component_id WHERE results.disabled IN (1) AND results.run_info_id = '${RUNID}' AND results.type IN ('system') ORDER BY component.name;

paragraphs.title: # Defects From System tests across N Days
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc 
SELECT 
distinct analysis_1.jira_url,
results.run_info_id,
analysis_1.type
FROM results
LEFT OUTER JOIN analysis AS analysis_1 ON results.id = analysis_1.result_id 
LEFT OUTER JOIN result_splits AS result_splits_1 ON results.id = result_splits_1.result_id
WHERE results.disabled IN (1)
AND results.run_info_id IN (select id from run_info where FROM_UNIXTIME(start_time) >= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -${FOR DAYS=30} DAY) )
AND results.release_id IN (1122,1139,1149,1161,1162)
AND results.type IN ('system')
AND analysis_1.type IN ('infrastructure','application','tests')
ORDER BY results.end_time;

paragraphs.title: # Defects From System tests across N Days and OS Group
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc 
SELECT 
distinct analysis_1.jira_url,
results.run_info_id,
analysis_1.type,results.os
FROM results
LEFT OUTER JOIN analysis AS analysis_1 ON results.id = analysis_1.result_id 
LEFT OUTER JOIN result_splits AS result_splits_1 ON results.id = result_splits_1.result_id
WHERE results.disabled IN (1)
AND results.run_info_id IN (select id from run_info where FROM_UNIXTIME(start_time) >= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -${FOR DAYS=30} DAY) )
AND results.release_id IN (1122,1139,1149,1161,1162)
AND results.type IN ('system')
AND analysis_1.type IN ('infrastructure','application','tests')
AND results.os like '${OS GROUP=centos-6,centos-6|centos-7|debian-|ubuntu-|suse-}%'
ORDER BY results.end_time;

paragraphs.title: # of Blocked tests for a run-id across components
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc 
SELECT  component.name,analysis.jira_url , analysis.number_of_testcases as TC_BLOCKED FROM results LEFT OUTER JOIN analysis ON results.id = analysis.result_id LEFT OUTER JOIN component ON component.id =results.component_id WHERE results.disabled IN (1) AND results.run_info_id = '${RUNID}' AND results.type IN ('system') ORDER BY component.name;
